detail_desc: Short, wide T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, printed sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a motif, lined, drawstring, wrapover hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.

Push-up lace bralette with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that meet at the back and finish with a lace trim, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in a cotton knit with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Tunic in woven fabric with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, detachable tie belt at the waist and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a padded shaft, elasticated lacing and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles. Patterned soles. Height of soles 2.3 cm.
Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a narrow, detachable tie belt and a gently flared skirt. Satin lining.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a glow-in-the-dark print on the uppers and ribbed cuffs.
V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with covered buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Alice band in a crinkled weave with a knot detail on top.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Mules in satin with covered block heels, jersey linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.

prod_name: Merry HW Slim Mom Denim TRS
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Short pencil skirt in a jacquard weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Shimmering metallic leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Leather and rubber insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Scarf in a soft, textured knit with ribbed edges. Size 50x170 cm.

Puffer jacket in a padded, quilted weave with a slight sheen. High collar, a padded, detachable hood with a faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets with a press-stud, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with motifs and beaded appliqués, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Studio Collection. Long hoodie in patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric. Lined hood with a contrasting colour drawstring, dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and contrasting colour ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Top in matt satin made from a silk and Tencel™ lyocell blend with wide, tie-top shoulder straps in a contrasting colour and a V-neck. Opening with a covered button at the back and slits in the sides. Lined at the top. The top is dyed in a natural, sustainable way using coffee.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, flounce at the top, buttons down the front and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt with a print motif and straight-cut hem.
Short jersey dress with long sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned, crinkled weave with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and high slits at the hems.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heel 5 cm.
Jacket in supersoft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with concealed press-studs and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Ties at one side and smocking at the back of the hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathered tiers to create width in the skirt. Unlined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Cotton canvas shoes with lacing at the front, rubber toe caps, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined tankini with a top and bikini bottoms. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and matching bottoms.

Short, sleeveless, glittery velour dress in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Decorative seam at the top, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Eight metal ear cuffs in various designs. Four with pearly plastic beads. Can be worn on non-pierced ears. Size from 1 cm to 1.7 cm.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted off-the-shoulder dress in smocked jersey with short sleeves.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with pleats at the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.

Wide, airy tunic in softly draping silk with a round neckline, small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Short sleeves, a gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Waistcoat in twill with buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Puff pants in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and narrow elastication and overlocked frill trim around the legs.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede.
Bracelets in various designs, one with an elastic strap and four in an adjustable length.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Wide, straight-cut shirt in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket, low dropped shoulders, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Loafers in velour with textile linings, quilted satin insoles and fluted soles.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, gathered yoke at the back, and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a chest pocket with a button, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Puffer gilet with a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, welt front pockets and a rounded hem. Lined.
Sturdy sandals in mesh and imitation leather with elastic lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Scuba fabric linings, textured insoles for comfort and patterned soles.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Imitation suede sandals with cylindrical heels covered in braided paper straw. Elastic gores in the sides and ankle straps with an adjustable metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a small collar, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit for a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Triangular cups with removable inserts and wide straps that tie at the back of the neck. Lined gusset.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a softly draping weave with a V-neck opening at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Contrasting colour faux fur collar, zip, side pockets with a quilted flap and press-stud, and ribbing at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy denim with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Loose-fitting T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits at the hem.
Aviator-style sunglasses with matt plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with decorative buttons at the front. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, and fake welt pockets at the back.
Denim jeans with a high waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Sandals in leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles.
